comments: Ms Brown is a really nice lady, but gets off track A LOT. She knows her stuff, that\'s for sure. But she kind of goes in circles sometimes when explaining something. Otherwise, Excel and Access with her were super easy.
Great professor with a wonderful personality for teaching. She makes everyone in the class a learner.
This instructor is the greatest professor that Baker could offer. She ranks high on knowledge and very helpful to all stuents in the class with respect I must add.

She is the easiest teacher ever... She gets off topic but if you ignore her and just go to work its the EASIEST A EVER!!! i got done with ALL the semesters work in 2 weeks.. Use your book on final as well..
She is a very fair teacher, respects class, and understands when you are having trouble in class and home. Great teacher, would take any of her classes!!!!!
